name: NORTHWEST KIDNEY CENTERS
sampleDescriptions: End-stage renal disease (ESRD) Medicare reimbursement and payment reform. ESRD quality measurement.  Improved policies for chronic kidney disease and transplantation.  Medicare Third Party Payment. Li
